history: AutoAgent is a modular AI system designed to automate knowledge work using a multi-agent architecture. It combines memory, context-awareness, retrieval-augmented generation, and tool orchestration to solve complex tasks. The system is made up of three key agents: the Planner Agent, the Executor Agent, and the Verifier Agent. This design allows AutoAgent to mimic human problem-solving more effectively and enables long-horizon reasoning.
